definition: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end, to go on a crusade
details:
noun
- a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end
= synonyms: cause
verb
- to go on a crusade
- to exert oneself continuously, vigorously, or obtrusively to gain an end or engage in a figh for a certain cause or person
= example: to exert oneself continuously, vigorously, or obtrusively to gain an end or engage in a figh for a certain cause or person
= synonyms: press
